title: Interactive electronic textbook, teacher version
shortDescription: An online book for Grade 10 Mathematics CBC. The teacher version allows for seamless feedback to be given.
longDescription: This is an interactive online textbook that spans the entire Grade 10 Mathematics Curriculum. It includes carefully designed questions that provide students with instantaneous feedback. The teacher version allows for seamless feedback to be given.

title: CBE Math Delivery I Course
shortDescription: A course on how to contribute to improvements in the Grade 10 Textboo.
longDescription: This course is designed for teachers and educators interested in learning more about competency based education and how to contribute to the co-development of open learning resources.
